website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality outfielder's glove with minimal break-in required.
pros: Made of full grain, oiled leather
Includes zero-shock palm pads for added hand protection
Offers a padded finger back lining for supreme comfort
Available in multiple sizes and colors
cons: Pocket is shallow and short in comparison to other outfielders' gloves

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Being a former division 1 baseball player, having owned and used many gloves. I have to say this is an excellent product and the price is one of the best parts. I bought this to help teach and play catch with my 7 year old son. This glove is of similar quality to the high end $200 and up gloves. Quick and easy to break in yet has excellent padding in the palm and fingers. I'll be purchasing another for my son when he has outgrown his current youth glove.
customer_reviews.author: chadblackwell32

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Glove is very nice with good amount of padding. Not really 90% broken in as advertised. Was actually quite stiff but wasn't really too big of a problem. Using this for high school baseball. Overall a great glove!
customer_reviews.author: Carson W.

customer_reviews.title: If your kid is serious get them a fielders nakona (11.25-11.75) and break it in properly.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Rec and travel ball coach, my old glove just completely disintegrated so I had to get a new one. Otherwise I would’ve died with that one. This glove is great for a coach and for many players as well. There are better and more expensive gloves that I would definitely buy if I was playing but this glove is perfect for a coach. When the kids hit 9-12 years and they are serious about ⚾️ it’s time to invest in a nakona. There are others but supposrting small business is more my cup of tee than supporting products made oversees.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great ball glove for the money. I don’t ever see a need for a glove that cost more that 100$. Unless you’re a pro and don’t care about throwing money on a glove. I have been playing baseball for 25 years. Youth ball all the way through Division 1 college ball. This glove will last many seasons. I promise. Rawlings is hard to beat. And I’m not sure why some people don’t think this glove is not pre broken in. They must have never owned an expensive glove like an A2000. Those are like rocks when you first get them. This glove is comfortable and ready to go right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: 1st Base Glove (12.5)
customer_reviews.text: Got the glove on-time and it's nice and big. I have a good sized adult hand and it fits me fine. However, it's not near 90% broken in. I'd say 60% at best. Another coach put it on and said, "it's pretty stiff, will need plenty of catch first.." Seems like a nice glove and has a nice size to it.
customer_reviews.author: Witt

customer_reviews.title: Nice backyard glove
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12 3/4 glove for backyard catch because the style reminds me of a glove I had as a kid. The leather and stitching are about medium quality and the palm and fingers are nicely padded. The fit is as expected and while not 90% broken in as claimed it should loosen up after a few weeks. Update: just finished up a season of Spring and Fall little league with the kid and the glove is breaking in nicely. I have been using saddle soap to keep it clean and soften the leather. This glove should definitely last a few years with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove. Great combination of quality and usability. It's padded enough to use until and maybe through HS, but flexible enough to use in Little League. My 12 year old plays year round baseball on multiple teams, and this is just what we needed as an upgrade from a younger player's catcher's mitt. Most of his teammates use the glove too when they catch. Rawlings is an absolute authority on all things baseball. Review by former NCAA division 1 player.
customer_reviews.author: M.Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Best glove we have had
customer_reviews.text: My son is an All-Star player at SS , 12u age group. So his glove is huge. This one has been money since day one. His fielding picked up some with this glove as he gained confidence that the ball wouldn’t hurt no matter how hard it was hit. So now even With rockets he stands in there and makes the play. This glove has definitely upped his game!
customer_reviews.author: Bigbellied1

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little bit of break in-- very decent glove
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glove for a 13 year old baseball player. The glove looks great, and did not take too long to break in. It definitely requires some work-- it won't be ready to go right away, but with some dedication it can be ready within a reasonable amount of time. He says it feels very comfortable and it's getting better every day.
customer_reviews.author: M47W

customer_reviews.title: Broken in feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove! Since sheltering in place I've been playing hours of catch with my boys, and my hand was taking a beating. This glove is super comfortable with a "broken in feeling". This makes playing catch much more enjoyable. I have hands like a sasquatch, and always have problems with any kind of gloves, so I was concerned with finding a mitt that fits. This glove is perfect for big hands.
customer_reviews.author: Chickendrop

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional.  Great Glove!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great glove! I bought this to play with my son. We already have a lot of memories with this glove and I’ve only owned it a couple of months. It was easy to break in and did great from the start.
customer_reviews.author: That Review Person

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: We found this glove to be an excellent value. We have had an entry level catcher's mitt since my son was 9. Now that he is 14 and throwing 75 mph, we needed something with more padding. So far, so good. This has taken most of the sting away and seems to be a quality glove for a mid to low range model. The glove was ready to catch upon arrival with very little break-in time. We will need to see how this holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: it will work just fine
customer_reviews.text: decent glove, just need a couple years of breaking in to get to where my old glove was. Hope who ever stole my old glove is getting good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this glove. The leather is soft and didn’t require much breaking in. My hands are kind of small and it fit me without adjusting the glove at all. Perfect for a game of catch with the kid.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mouledoux

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for a backup glove or just practicing catching. After some oiling and break-in it works great for exactly what I want it for.
customer_reviews.author: ifallalot

customer_reviews.title: Great service, excellent product and fair relation between value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and wasn't expecting such an awesome service. Was delivered from the US to Portugal in just 4 days. Was cheaper than to order from any other amazon service in the EU... even paying more than 30€ for shipping... The glove is beautiful and extremely comfortable. Adapts right away to your hand. Catching the ball is very smooth thanks to fabric and protections used and on the net, you barely feel the impact. In sum, great service, excellent product for anyone whose starting the practice of the sport and fair relation between value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: DrJeckyl

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and I am very happy. Good all around glove imo. OF and third base ideally I suppose. Should fit an adult and teen very well
customer_reviews.author: robert cook

customer_reviews.title: Wow, great glove
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, broke it in in aboit 2 days. My favorite glove i have ever owned after hundreds of games and even more practices
customer_reviews.author: JF2013

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product at a great price. My glove got stolen so I wanted to replace it with something decent but not too expensive and picked a Rawlings. Phenomenal glove!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Glove fits 12 year old's hand perfectly. Medium sized child. Plays all positions but needed a catchers glove because pitchers at his level are too fast and hard. Glove came almost totally broken in. Two nights with oil was all it needed. Perfect All Around Glove At A Perfect Price!
customer_reviews.author: LisaHatley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mitt for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old loves it!! He does say it is rough inside and will need to wear a batting glove with it, but he's still breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: holly b.

customer_reviews.title: easy break-in
customer_reviews.text: Bought this glove in late June, 2020 and have used it already in adult baseball game conditions even without break-in oil, etc. Can't beat the price for quality, padding, and comfort if you're looking for a very affordable mitt for weekly use. If you have small or medium size hands this is a very good catcher's mitt. Too early to comment on durability so I'll give it 3 stars hoping it lasts at least a few years.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL ELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Playable right out of the box. Great construction. I tried a player preferred and it had a seem under the ring finger. The sandlot glove is better.
customer_reviews.author: flyerjuls

customer_reviews.title: Great, could be broken in more
customer_reviews.text: Great, could be broken in more. plus there was a weird stitch on one of the fingers, I think it's the thumb, I had to take it out for my kid to get his hand. Same thing several reviews stated
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the padding in the glove. My son has a good arm and without the “infielders” padding, a lot of catches would sting. Nice deep basket secures the ball nicely. Overall, great glove for practicing with my son
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a month and so far, no complaints. Looks good. Feels good. Recommended to anyone looking for a shorter length glove.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great glove  for the price
customer_reviews.text: This glove worked great for my 13 yr old nephew. My nephew just started playing baseball and needed a glove ASAP. Very minimal break in needed and leather was soft enough he could use the glove immediately in a game situation if he had to
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mitt  SS 3B OF
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice.. I m talking A1🤫 mitt Still needs to be broken in abit n needs s lil glove oil or butter to finish off that playground look. Only thing it missing is a finger hole 🕳 woulda nailed 5 ⭐️ s
customer_reviews.author: Lefty Luck Luch

customer_reviews.title: Great glove and the price was right.
customer_reviews.text: The glove came partially broken in, the fit was great. It is a well made glove, sure I will have it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Curley

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price were right on for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Gave to son in law for Christmas. My grand son is 11. He is a pitcher and his dad is his practice catcher Chris was impressed with quality
customer_reviews.author: debra n

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yo loves this glove! Had the same glove and our german Shepherd used it as a chew toy. Beautifully made, durable, all around great glove!
customer_reviews.author: LisaB13

customer_reviews.title: Nice mitt
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year girl loved it. Good Mitt overall, looks like it should hold up for a few years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mitt
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a glove just to have, and boy did this not disappoint. It is partially broken in and looks like a $200 glove. If you want a glove for a steal, its this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ajcal

customer_reviews.title: Good looking glove
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality glove not to much to break in. Looks good. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Sam P

customer_reviews.title: Just a great glove
customer_reviews.text: The glove is almost completely broken in. The only thing that really needs to be worked on is the closing of the glove and the impact creation inside the glove. Both of which are generally easy to do. The fact that it’s also $20 bucks cheaper than dicks is also a very big plus. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: R. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Since my grandson is left handed, it is difficult to find a baseball mitt for him locally. It was good to have him look for one he liked, and order it. It arrived in less than 24 hrs. Unfortunately, it was too large for his hand, so I had to exchange it for a smaller size. That was no problem and again arrived within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rinas

customer_reviews.title: Great value glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove looks sharp and is comfortable to wear and use. Broke it in using the soaking and beating with a mallet method and it was ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bazzell

customer_reviews.title: Nice mitt
customer_reviews.text: Was my sons first first basemans mitt and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this glove! It’s perfect. I use it for coaching both baseball and softball. Very soft, easily broken in, and feels comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anna Spratlin

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort & fit are fanastic. Easily 80-90% break in. I was able to use it out of the box without issue. Durability feels good, but won't really know for a couple years. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for playing catch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this glove to play catch on family camping trip. Arrived pretty much broken in. Great glove, good stitching, and quality you’d expect from the gold glove company. This glove was almost $30 more expensive at my local Big 5 Sporting Goods
customer_reviews.author: nomar

customer_reviews.title: Good glove. Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the money. Leather feels quality and super comfortable. Break in time was minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item, soft and flexible! This will be great for my grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is amazing!! the only thing wrong was that it didn't come very broken in. Great buy just as good as $265 gloves.
customer_reviews.author: James Rabbitt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great glove and a great value. No issues getting it broke in. Came when it was supposed to in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this glove. It is comfortable and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: John Pizzarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old really likes it. Fits well and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mommylife

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: The leather is nice and thick, and it's breaking in well with mink oil.
customer_reviews.author: Bitofinger

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! This will be a gift to my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tobias

customer_reviews.title: These Baseball Glove is AMAZING! My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: These Baseball Glove is AMAZING! My son loves it. His hands and finger are long and fits well, has padding as well. My son is really Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. The leather is soft and the glove broke it very easily without any oils.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal, this is way more expensive in stores near us. If we can just keep the dang dog away from it now, I'm sure it'll last for quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hosier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money,I purchased to catch some balls with my son and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is definitely 5 star worthy. Color patterns, price, and EASY to break in! Looks like a professional glove. I love the Rawlings company, never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Made well, wish I had had one this good as a kid, I might have become a good baseball player
customer_reviews.author: William Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: I am an enthusiast player, this is an excellent glove for weeken player
customer_reviews.author: Federico Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove!!! You will need to break it in to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Functions and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fit and feel is very good. Would recommend to friends and I would buy again when/if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Ahh gyeah
customer_reviews.text: This glove is priced great. Soft leather, not too stiff and looks amazing IMO.
customer_reviews.author: ticalian stallion

customer_reviews.title: Great ball glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, bought this for my dad for Christmas, he uses it to practice with my brother
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price was good. Just needed a glove to catch for my ...
customer_reviews.text: It okay. Price was good. Just needed a glove to catch for my young son.
customer_reviews.author: The Leggings Gallery

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, delivery was on time and the material es perfecto, seem it will be a long term glove!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Paz

customer_reviews.title: Really nice deal
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son... he liked it right away. A little bit hard at the beginning, but in no time he was using it like his last glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Alcazar

customer_reviews.title: nice glove
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a new glove for me to teach my children how to play baseball. Nice comfort and easy to break in.
customer_reviews.author: A fun read

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great glove was slightly broken in already. Happy with this glove
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove for 9 - 10 year old girls softball. It was the best purchase possible. The comfort of the glove is amazing and the price is perfect. I recommend this for anyone.....
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: It works as an adult IF glove. As expected it does take some breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this glove
customer_reviews.text: First baseball season I had and I decided to buy my own glove and went for this one. It worked wonders for me. It has great padding and is overall wonderful for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Eryk

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Wish i got it a little smaller but overall love it
customer_reviews.author: Angel M Casarin

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove
customer_reviews.text: Great Glove it's my first baseball glove. As I live in Italy so I searched online and after long search I tried on this glove and I must say it was a great move.. satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh Ali Kayani

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, this is a really good glove. Used to play college with a heart of the hide series and this really isn't far off for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When the glove is wet it gets really heavy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glove, my son loves it at 1st base and doesn't miss anything. Very good for short hops, and just in general.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Adamietz

customer_reviews.title: Recommended at this price range
customer_reviews.text: I had it for couple of months by now it is a great glove recommended at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Holly, General Manager

customer_reviews.title: Quality and speed.
customer_reviews.text: Came to the house within a few days from the initial order. Easy to break the glove in. Broke it in by playing catch with my kid. Definitely worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pozo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - great value
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Great value. Bought to throw ball around with son.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s already broken in. I don’t like that the web seams flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well broken in from the factory
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove for the price, very comfy. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings glove
customer_reviews.text: Like the glove worked great for my sons tryout . He loved it ... like they way it was well Broked in
customer_reviews.author: Marco Moreno

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for dads and amateurs alike
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a pro or even an amateur for that matter. I’m a dad who like playing catch with my son and teaching him fundamentals. This is an underpriced glove for what it’s worth. It’s not as stiff as pro gloves and not as flimsy as cheap gloves. It formed easy and broke in playing catch with my son. It’s very useable out of the box and smelled like natural leather and not chemical like some cheap “leather” gloves. Overall, if you’re playing catch with your son or playing an actual league game and would rather save money for beer than a glove, grab this one.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy this glove
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glove honestly so good for the cost and it breaks in easily I definitely recommend this glove
customer_reviews.author: Virginia ochoas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good game ready glove, nice leather, all at a great price... Ah, also an excellent prime delivery...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Azpurua E.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality glove! My son plays 8 U and 9U travelball and loves this glove!
customer_reviews.author: Addie Abner

customer_reviews.title: Solid glove, especially at the price
customer_reviews.text: Well-made rawlings glove that does not dissapoint or hurt the wallet!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: CATCHER’S MIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the description does it state it’s a catcher’s mit. The pictures show a fielders glove with finger slots. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeseburger

product_meta.title: Rawlings Sandlot Series Baseball Gloves
product_meta.description: The new Sandlot Series baseball gloves from Rawlings feature an oiled pull-up leather that gives the models a unique vintage look and feel with minimal break-in required. The designs are further enhanced with pro-style patterns. - 11.5 Inch Model - Pro I Web - Conventional Open Back - Full Grain Oiled Shell Leather for Durability - Zero Shock Palm for Extra Protection - Padded Finger Back Linings for Unmatched Comfort - Professional Web Designs - Break-in: 80% Factory / 20% Player
feature_bullets: 12-3/4-inch Baseball glove for men crafted from Full-Grain, oiled leather for a vintage look
Zero shock palm pads protect your hands
Padded finger back lining ensures superior comfort
Ready to play; Comes 90 percent broken-in from the factory
Available in a wide range of glove lengths and web styles
Right Hand Throw = Left Hand Glove, Left Hand Throw = Right Hand Glove
Right Hand Orientation = Right Hand Throw / Left Hand Orientation = Left Hand Throw
